front.title: Pseudo Content Delivery Protocol (CDP) for Protecting Multiple Source Flows in FEC Framework

abstract.t: This document provides a pseudo Content Delivery Protocol (CDP) toprotect multiple source flows with one or more repair flows based onthe FEC Framework document and the Session Description Protocol (SDP)elements defined for the framework. The purpose of the document isnot to provide a full-pledged protocol, but to show how the definedframework and SDP elements can be combined together to design a CDP.
